sentence: Those are the acceptable sins, respectively, of Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, Lauren Boebart, Matt Gaetz, and Paul Gosar.
author: Wajahat Ali
title: Sorry, Mitch McConnell. Frankenstein’s Monster Runs the GOP Now

sentence: "As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling," Cheney tweeted.
author: David Jackson
title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene criticized for speaking at white nationalist conference

sentence: "As Rep Marjorie Taylor Greene and Rep Paul Gosar speak at this white supremacist, anti-Semitic, pro-Putin event, silence by Republican Party leaders is deafening and enabling," Cheney tweeted.
author: David Jackson
title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene criticized for speaking at white nationalist conference

sentence: Arizona Republican congressman Paul Gosar also appeared via pre-recorded video.
author: TOI staff and Agencies
title: US Rep. Taylor-Greene slammed for addressing white supremacist gathering

sentence: And Marjorie Taylor Greene and Paul Gosar, I don't know them, but I'm reminded of that old line from the 'Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid' movie, where one character says, 'Morons, I have got morons on my team.'
title: Romney Rips Taylor Greene, Gosar’s Appearance on White Nationalist Conference: ‘I’ve Got Morons on My Team’

sentence: Mitch McConnell said in a statement on Monday afternoon: “There’s no place in the Republican Party for white supremacists or anti-Semitism.” | Anna Moneymaker/Getty Images By Burgess Everett and Olivia Beavers 02/28/2022 02:56 PM EST Updated: 02/28/2022 06:35 PM EST Reps. Paul Gosar and Marjorie Taylor Greene are on an island among their fellow GOP lawmakers after appearing with a white nationalist group over the weekend.
title: Greene and Gosar increasingly isolated in Hill GOP after speaking at white nationalist event

sentence: Founded in 2020 by white nationalist Nick Fuentes as an alternative to the more buttoned-up (but often still batshit) Conservative Political Action Committee, or CPAC, the conference featured a slew of controversial figures, from fellow Representatives Paul Gosar and Steve King to Gavin McInnes and Milo Yiannopoulos.
author: Alex Shephard
title: Sorry, Marjorie Taylor Greene Is Part of the Republican Establishment Now

sentence: Republican Sen. Mitt Romney slammed both Greene and Republican Rep. Paul Gosar of Arizona, who sent pre-taped remarks to the conference.
author: Emily Goodin
title: 'Have you lost all sense of decency?' Liz Cheney shames Kevin McCarthy for not chastising Marjorie Taylor Greene for speaking at white nationalist event

sentence: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell (R-KY) and House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy (R-CA) slammed Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) and Paul Gosar (R-AZ) for attending a white nationalist event.
author: Jackson Richman
title: McConnell, McCarthy Slams Greene, Gosar for Attending White Nationalist Event

sentence: GOP leaders in the House and the Senate on Monday denounced a pair of far-right Trump allies — Reps. Marjorie Taylor Greene, R-Ga., and Paul Gosar, R-Ariz. — for speaking at a gathering of white nationalists in Florida over the weekend.
author: Steve Benen
title: Republican leaders offer incomplete rebukes of Greene and Gosar

sentence: If supremacists are still in the party ... Republican Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell, in condemning Arizona’s Rep. Paul Gosar and Georgia Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene for participating in the America First conference, a haven for racists, white supremacists, anti-Semites and supporters of Russia’s Vladimir Putin, said on Monday that “there’s no place in the Republican Party for white supremacists or antisemitism.” That, sadly, is a lie.
author: EJ Montini
title: Big Lie 2.0: White supremacy has no place in the Republican Party

sentence: The petition, from a group called Faithful America, is addressed to “RNC Chair Ronna McDaniel” and says “As grassroots Christians from across the country, we call on the RNC to censure Representatives Marjorie Taylor Green and Paul Gosar for taking part in the explicitly white nationalist America First Political Action Conference.” McDaniel did issue a statement over the weekend condemning “white supremacy, neo-Nazism, hate speech and bigotry are disgusting and do not have a home in the Republican Party.” Both Greene and Gosar have been roundly condemned for addressing the conference hosted by white nationalist and Holocaust-denier Nick Fuentes.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Nearly 13,000 Christians Sign Petition Calling on the RNC to Censure Reps. Greene and Gosar For Addressing White Nationalist Group

sentence: Republican Reps. Paul Gosar (R-AZ) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) also spoke at the conference, receiving resounding condemnation, even from within their own party.
author: Alex Griffing
title: Local Reporter Praised For Viral Interview Pushing Idaho Lt. Governor on White Nationalist Ties: ‘As Painful As This is to Watch – It Matters’
